    News

    • 07/23: I will spent three months at a summer internship at Meta in Seattle.

    • 06/23: I will give a talk at UBC Vancouver, Canada.

    • 05/23: I will give a talk about Advanced Machine Learning for Rendering at the High Beams seminar.

    • 03/23: A preprint of our work on learning local surrogate losses for non-differentiable graphics is now available on arXiv!

    • 02/23: Our work on plateau-free differentiable path tracing was accepted to CVPR 2023.

    • 01/23: Our work on meta-sampling for BRDF learners was accepted to Eurographics 2023.

    • 12/22: I presented our work Metappearance at Siggraph Asia 2022.

    • 12/22: I was invited as a speaker at the KAIST Geometric & Visual Computing Workshop in Daejeon, South Korea.

    • 10/22: I was invited to give a talk at Meta Reality Labs.

    • 03/22: I gave a talk about meta-learning for appearance reproduction at PRIME.

    • 07/21: I gave a talk at the High Beams seminar.

    • 11/20: I presented our work NICER at ACHI 2020.

    • 10/20: I presented my work on parallax-correct appearance decompositions at the VECG Seminar series.
